title: Business Development - Ecosystem & Onboarding Success Manager
content:
Evmos is on a mission to develop and ship the tools necessary to build cross-chain applications of the future, freeing developers from the confines of today’s siloed blockchains. 
We are building a fairer financial system without limits, for everyone, everywhere, by leveraging the latest, most secure and scalable technology: blockchain.
Check out our website and read our latest manifesto!
About the role
Location: Berlin-based (we will consider very strong candidates from the rest of the EU).

We are seeking a highly proactive individual who can drive new growth by targeting projects that aren’t already building on Evmos. As the Ecosystem Onboarding and Success Manager, you will be responsible for developing an active and prosperous ecosystem of value creation on the Evmos blockchain, work with existing ecosystem projects and report directly to the Chief Product Officer (CPO), Daniel. If successful, this candidate will bring new projects, brands and users to the Evmos Ecosystem.

Source leads: Find dApps and business looking to use EVM infrastructure and identify potential revenue streams of selling business licenses.
Sell: Pitch, listen, and convince to get dApps to build on Evmos or use our software. Be a liaison for projects to feel supported with any obstacles they face.
Prioritize: Identify missing building blocks in the Evmos ecosystem and define strategic priorities. Assess and collaborate with reputable and anticipated projects.
Document effectively: Structure collaborations between Evmos and prospective/existing projects and track your progress and project assessments in the internal CRM. Listen to and collect feedback, reporting it to the product team to help refine and improve our software.
Project Management: Execute cross-functional projects involving Partners, Ecosystem contributors, and the core Evmos team. Demand deliverables and be annoying about timelines.
Be everywhere: Serve as the primary point of contact between validators, governance, independent contributors to the ecosystem, and the core Evmos team. Establish a strong presence in the blockchain community and Evmos ecosystem, representing Evmos in various events. Plan and execute events like webinars, office hours, AMAs, and other partner/community engagements to communicate and educate Ecosystem participants about initiatives, opportunities, and updates within the community.
Keep in Sync: Be the voice of the customer and work with product, marketing, engineering teams to help drive use cases for the Evmos blockchain. Support existing projects within the Evmos ecosystem and coordinate players in the ecosystem to successfully launch on Evmos.

Who we are looking for

1-3 years of experience in a similar role in either the Cosmos- or Ethereum ecosystem
Ability to manage multiple projects and coordinate with multiple teams simultaneously
Can bring existing web3 relationships and has an understanding of Ecosystem components
Works autonomously, creating and adhering to your own goals and desired outcomes for the team
Solid understanding of blockchain technology and DeFi ecosystems - active DeFi user with hands-on experience is a plus!
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Solid ability to identify and collaborate with reputable projects and support their goals of building on Evmos
Willingness to travel
Technical understanding of how blockchain applications work behind the scenes and analytic abilities to understand their differentiators

Why choose Evmos?
People make Evmos! We understand the importance of work-life balance and pride ourselves on our hybrid work environment and warm & welcoming culture that makes room for everyone's needs!
You'll be joining at a pivotal time on our growth journey - we just raised $27m in funding from investors and we're poised to accelerate towards our goal of becoming the playground for Ethereum Apps in the Cosmos ecosystem.
Our team are pioneers in teaching the first university-level Blockchain for Developers course at UC Berkeley, and are the perfect guides for your journey. You'll be able to expand your knowledge in cutting-edge blockchain technologies and its related fields. On top of all that, we also offer:

Flexible hours to ensure that our team members can work at times that suit their individual needs and schedules.
Openness, transparency, and trust
We foster creativity and innovation - everyone's ideas and opinions are valued and respected
All team members feel welcome and appreciated for who they are
We love getting together as a team and hosting community events! This is a great opportunity to network and meet like-minded people in the Cosmos community!
Competitive salary and bonus structure
Opportunity to work in a dynamic and innovative industry
Professional development opportunities
Health and wellness benefits

Please reach out to us if you have a special requirement when applying to a position and we will happily take it into consideration.

questions.label: How long have you worked for a crypto or blockchain related company in the past? (combined years across all crypto/blockchain related companies)
Please submit a short paragraph on why they are you applying to Evmos and what impact you will have on the project within 90 days.
Are you a resident of an EU country?
